name: Satelligner
description:
In the somewhat time-ambiguous future, the people of the space age have settled on a new form of communication: the laser-powered telephone.

Align Satellites, blow up asteroids, and navigate other obstacles to make a connection!

Credits

This game was made for the 2021 Southern Student Summer Jam. The theme of the jam was "Transmission."

All assets and mechanics were created/generated by Will Carpenter

Tools Used
  • Game Engine - Unity 2020.3
  • 3D Modeling - Blender
  • 2D Art - Aseprite
  • Sound Recording/Editing - Audacity
  • Instrument for level end jingle - Kalimba
  • Music Creation - LMMS
  • Space Skybox Generation - https://wwwtyro.github.io/space-3d/
